00024 /*******************************************************************************

00026 * RoboCupGameControlData.h
00027 *

00034 
00035 #ifndef _RoboCupGameControlData_h_DEFINED
00036 #define _RoboCupGameControlData_h_DEFINED
00037 
00038 //Defining int types:
00039 //#define  uint8 char 
00040 #define  uint16 unsigned short int
00041 #define  uint32 unsigned long int 
00042 
00043 // port for GameController network traffic
00044 #define GAMECONTROLLER_PORT             3838
00045 
00046 // data structure version number
00047 #define GAMECONTROLLER_STRUCT_VERSION   6
00048 
00049 // data structure header
00050 #define GAMECONTROLLER_STRUCT_HEADER    "RGme"
00051 
00052 // the maximum number of players per team
00053 #define MAX_NUM_PLAYERS             11
00054 
00055 // team numbers
00056 #define TEAM_BLUE                   0
00057 #define TEAM_RED                    1
00058 
00059 // game states
00060 #define STATE_INITIAL               0
00061 #define STATE_READY                 1
00062 #define STATE_SET                   2
00063 #define STATE_PLAYING               3
00064 #define STATE_FINISHED              4
00065 
00066 // secondary game states
00067 #define STATE2_NORMAL               0
00068 #define STATE2_PENALTYSHOOT         1
00069 
00070 // penalties
00071 #define PENALTY_NONE                0
00072 #define PENALTY_BALL_HOLDING        1
00073 #define PENALTY_GOALIE_PUSHING      2
00074 #define PENALTY_PLAYER_PUSHING      3
00075 #define PENALTY_ILLEGAL_DEFENDER    4
00076 #define PENALTY_ILLEGAL_DEFENSE     5
00077 #define PENALTY_OBSTRUCTION         6
00078 #define PENALTY_REQ_FOR_PICKUP      7
00079 #define PENALTY_LEAVING             8
00080 #define PENALTY_DAMAGE              9
00081 #define PENALTY_MANUAL              10
00082 
00083 
00084 // information that describes a player
00085 struct RobotInfo {
00086     uint16 penalty;             // penalty state of the player
00087     uint16 secsTillUnpenalised; // estimate of time till unpenalised
00088 };
00089 
00090 
00091 // information that describes a team
00092 struct TeamInfo {
00093     uint8 teamNumber;          // unique team number
00094     uint8 teamColour;          // colour of the team
00095     uint16 score;               // team's score
00096     RobotInfo players[MAX_NUM_PLAYERS];       // the team's players
00097 };
00098 
00099 
00100 struct RoboCupGameControlData {
00101     char   header[4];           // header to identify the structure
00102     uint32 version;             // version of the data structure
00103     uint8 playersPerTeam;       // The number of players on a team
00104     uint8 state;                // state of the game (STATE_READY, STATE_PLAYING, etc)
00105     uint8 firstHalf;            // 1 = game in first half, 0 otherwise
00106     uint8 kickOffTeam;          // the next team to kick off
00107     uint8 secondaryState;       // Extra state information - (STATE2_NORMAL, STATE2_PENALTYSHOOT, etc)
00108     uint8 dropInTeam;           // team that caused last drop in
00109     uint16 dropInTime;          // number of seconds passed since the last drop in.  -1 before first dropin
00110     uint32 secsRemaining;       // estimate of number of seconds remaining in the half
00111     TeamInfo teams[2];
00112 };
00113 
00114 // data structure header
00115 #define GAMECONTROLLER_RETURN_STRUCT_HEADER    "RGrt"
00116 
00117 #define GAMECONTROLLER_RETURN_STRUCT_VERSION   1
00118 
00119 #define GAMECONTROLLER_RETURN_MSG_MAN_PENALISE 0
00120 #define GAMECONTROLLER_RETURN_MSG_MAN_UNPENALISE 1
00121 
00122 struct RoboCupGameControlReturnData {
00123         char    header[4];
00124         uint32  version;
00125         uint16  team;
00126         uint16  player;                         // player number - 1 based
00127         uint32  message;
00128 };

00130 #endif
